entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 p.m. NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.7Â°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 in the evening then south 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
